material:
CERTIFICATE OF OWNERSHIP AND MERGER



MERGING



NETAPP NC CORPORATION,



a Delaware corporation



WITH AND INTO



NETWORK APPLIANCE, INC.,



a Delaware corporation



(Pursuant to Section 253 of the General Corporation Law of Delaware)



Network Appliance, Inc. (the Corporation), a corporation incorporated on the

1st day of November, 2001, pursuant to the provisions of the General

Corporation Law of the State of Delaware, does hereby certify as follows:



1\. That the Corporation is organized and existing under the General

Corporation Law of the State of Delaware.



2\. That the Corporation owns 100% of the capital stock of NetApp NC

Corporation, a Delaware corporation ( Sub ) incorporated on the 6th day of

March, 2008, pursuant to the provisions of the General Corporation Law of the

State of Delaware.



3\. That the Corporation determined to merge Sub into itself (the Merger) by

the resolutions of its board of directors attached hereto as Exhibit A , duly

adopted on March 3, 2008.



4\. Pursuant to Section 253(b) of the General Corporation Law of Delaware the

name of the corporation surviving the merger shall be NetApp, Inc.



5\. The Merger shall become effective upon filing with the Delaware Secretary

of State.



IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Corporation has caused this Certificate to be signed

by its duly authorized officer on this 10 day of  

March, 2008.



NETWORK APPLIANCE, INC.



|  |  |  |  

---|---|---|---|---  

  

By:
